job.title: Principal Software Engineer (Python)
job.description:
If you are a Principal Software Engineer (Python) with experience, please read on!
What You Will Be Doing
Key Responsibilities
Define technical architecture & roadmap to realize it
Deliver features on a cadence within an agile framework
Write code across all areas of the product
Define quality & process standards
Support definition of user stories
Working with product team, estimate time & resources needed to achieve goals
What You Need for this Position
BS in Computer Science or equivalent
10+ years experience in software engineering
5+ years experience with Python, including one web framework & pandas/numpy
1+ years experience with React
1+ years research or industry experience building ML models
Expertise with multiple data storage platforms/architectures
Expertise in AWS
Strong Unix/Linux fundamentals
Nice to have: MS in Computer Science or equivalent
-Nice to have: Exposure to ad tech concepts & terminology-
What's In It for You
Competitive salary
Collaborative and creative atmosphere, with inspired leadership
Career advancement opportunities
Recognition and reward for outstanding performance, with high bonus potential
Great medical, dental & vision Insurance packages
Competitive 401K with company match to plan for the long term
Unlimited paid-time-off
Transportation benefits & cell phone reimbursement
Casual dress all day, every day
So, if you are a Principal Software Engineer (Python) with experience, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Shiv.Warrier@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : SW3-1637254 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Shiv Warrier - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
